mapper.select: SELECT apply_id, bianhao , applyname, approve, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, c_apply.usenature, stats, notes, c_register.car_id, carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.department_id, department.department_name, fatherdep, c_driver.driver_id, drviername FROM c_apply LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_apply.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_apply.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_apply.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE 0 = 0 and stats='未审批' and approve = #{approve} order by applytime desc

SELECT apply_id, bianhao , applyname, approve, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, c_apply.usenature, stats, notes, c_register.car_id, carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.department_id, department.department_name, fatherdep, c_driver.driver_id, drviername FROM c_apply LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_apply.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_apply.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_apply.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE 0 = 0 and approve = #{0} and c_apply.department_id=#{1} and stats='未审批' order by applytime desc

SELECT apply_id, bianhao , applyname, approve, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, c_apply.usenature, stats, notes, c_register.car_id, carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.department_id, department.department_name, fatherdep, c_driver.driver_id, drviername FROM c_apply LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_apply.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_apply.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_apply.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE 0 = 0 and approve = #{0} and (c_apply.department_id=#{1} or department.fatherdep=#{2}) and stats='未审批' order by applytime desc
SELECT * FROM c_apply order by applytime

SELECT apply_id, bianhao , applyname, approve, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, c_apply.usenature, stats, notes, c_register.car_id, carnumber, c_register.useNature, department.department_id, department_name, fatherdep, c_driver.driver_id, drviername FROM c_apply LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_apply.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_apply.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_apply.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE apply_id = #{applyId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM c_apply WHERE apply_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT apply_id, bianhao , applyname, approve, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, c_apply.usenature, stats, notes, c_register.car_id, carnumber, department.department_id, department_name, fatherdep, c_driver.driver_id, drviername FROM c_apply LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_apply.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_apply.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_apply.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE departmentName LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{departmentName},'%' )

SELECT apply_id, bianhao , applyname, approve, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, c_apply.usenature, stats, notes, c_register.car_id, carnumber, department.department_id, department_name, fatherdep, c_driver.driver_id, drviername FROM c_apply LEFT JOIN c_register ON c_apply.car_id = c_register.car_id LEFT JOIN department ON c_apply.department_id = department.department_id LEFT JOIN c_driver ON c_apply.driver_id = c_driver.driver_id WHERE applyname LIKE CONCAT( '%',#{applyname},'%' )
mapper.sql: apply_id, bianhao, applyname, approve, car_id, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, stats, notes, department_id, driver_id, usenature
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_apply
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into c_apply (apply_id, bianhao, applyname, approve, car_id, people, thing, days, outtime, applytime, approvetime, driver, stats, notes, department_id, driver_id, usenature) values (#{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{people,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{thing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{days,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approvetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usenature,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update c_apply
apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bianhao = #{record.bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applyname = #{record.applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve = #{record.approve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
people = #{record.people,jdbcType=INTEGER},
thing = #{record.thing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
days = #{record.days,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outtime = #{record.outtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
applytime = #{record.applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approvetime = #{record.approvetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
driver = #{record.driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stats = #{record.stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_id = #{record.driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usenature = #{record.usenature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update c_apply set apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bianhao = #{record.bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applyname = #{record.applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve = #{record.approve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{record.carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, people = #{record.people,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thing = #{record.thing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, days = #{record.days,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outtime = #{record.outtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applytime = #{record.applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approvetime = #{record.approvetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, driver = #{record.driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{record.stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_id = #{record.driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usenature = #{record.usenature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_apply
bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve = #{approve,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
people = #{people,jdbcType=INTEGER},
thing = #{thing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
days = #{days,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outtime = #{outtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
applytime = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approvetime = #{approvetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
usenature = #{usenature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_apply set bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applyname = #{applyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve = #{approve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, people = #{people,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thing = #{thing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, days = #{days,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outtime = #{outtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applytime = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approvetime = #{approvetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stats = #{stats,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usenature = #{usenature,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
